title: (Pwn2Own) Microsoft Windows vhdmp Driver Improper Authorization Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Microsoft Windows. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the vhdmp.sys driver. The issue results from improper authorization logic when accessing VHD files. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Microsoft has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2022-35751
timeline:
2022-05-25 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
